title: Data-Driven Scientific Leadership Course for Formative Assessment and Learning Outcome Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A leadership competency development program analyzing formative assessment data from VR simulations and BYOD environments to predict learning outcomes

learning_goals: Using learning analytics models, correlations can be analyzed between formative assessment results (quizzes, assignments) and learning activity data (simulation participation rates, VR resource usage frequency)
A predictive model applying the Random Forest algorithm can forecast learners' final performance (comprehensive evaluation) with over 80% accuracy
The three core predictive factors most strongly correlated with learning outcomes can be identified: formative assessment completion rates, prior assessment results, and VR interaction frequency
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
